name: BattleBIM
description:
This custom package consist of 101 custom nodes. I am not sure whether it is useful for you.

Let me know if you have any comments or questions at lingkonn@gmail.com

All the examples of can be found at the following link https://www.facebook.com/groups/DynamoSingapore/
contents:
Add Prefix_Suffix to Family & FamilyTypes(System & Component Family) (BattleBIM) - This custom node will allow you to add Prefix & Suffix to Family & Family Types of System & Component Family, Add Prefix_Suffix to Family (BattleBIM) - This custom node will allow you to add Prefix & Suffix to Family , Add Prefix_Suffix to FamilyTypes | System & Component Family (BattleBIM) - This custom node will allow you to add Prefix & Suffix to Family Types of System and Component Family , Add Prefix_Suffix to FamilyTypes | ComponentFamily (BattleBIM) - This custom node will allow you to add Prefix & Suffix to Family Types of Component Family , Add Prefix_Suffix to FamilyTypes | SystemFamily (BattleBIM) - This custom node will allow you to add Prefix & Suffix to Family Types of System Family, ACI.Color.Pro(BattleBIM) - This Custom Node contain AutoCAD Color Index with 255 RGB Colors (Based on AutoCAD 2017) You can select single/multiple color at once, Color.Rainbow(BattleBIM) - Color.Rainbow(BattleBIM), Random Color (BattleBIM) - This custom node will generate random color, RGBtoHEXtoRGB(BattleBIM) - This Custom node will Convert RGB value to HEX and HEX to RGB value, Base64ToString (BattleBIM) - Convert base64 to String, BytesToGB_MB (BattleBIM) - Convert Bytes to GB & MB, StringToBase64 (BattleBIM) - Convert String to base64, IF.EmptyList (BattleBIM) - This custom node will return "list-a" if "seq" is empty(null/nothing) else will return "list-b, x if y else None (BattleBIM) - if test True will return x else None, Directory.Bake(BattleBIM) - Copy file one directory to another directory. **It will rename by adding "(Duplicate xxx)" If detect any duplicate file name. [ Note: It will merge directory ], Directory_Directory.Contents+ - This custom node will Return all of the contents , Directory.Copy+(BattleBIM) - This Custom will copy file from one directory to another, Directory.Filter(BattleBIM) - Filter Directory, DirectoryInDirectory(BattleBIM) - This custom node will extract Directory within Directory with path ** For the HDD Drive type "D:\" (Drive letter:\), OS.ListDir_Name(BattleBIM) - Get current ListDir (Name), OS.ListDir_Path(BattleBIM) - Get current ListDir (Path), Seek.FileType(BattleBIM) - This Custom Node will return a list of unique file types which available in provided path **Walk, Display.ByGeometryRandomColor (BattleBIM) - Display.ByGeometryRandomColor (geometry), Refresh.BattleBIM - This Custom will refresh entire Dynamo graph, RunMe.BattleBIM - This Custom node will return input if runMe set to True, Wait(BattleBIM) - This Custom Node will Hold/Freeze entire graph. Input required by Seconds, Element.Name(BattleBIM) - This custom node will return name of the element **Forks, Element.SetName - Gets the name of a given Revit element **Forks, Excel.Hyperlink V1 (BattleBIM) - This Custom Node help you to generate Hyperlink in Excel. * For Root directory ** Hyperlink will be Absolute path, Excel.Hyperlink V2 (BattleBIM) - This Custom Node help you to generate Hyperlink in Excel. * For Root directory ** Hyperlink will be Absolute path, Excel.Hyperlink_Files (BattleBIM) - This Custom Node help you to generate Hyperlink in Excel. ** Hyperlink will be Absolute path, File.Filter (BattleBIM) - Filter Files, File.Open (BattleBIM) - This Custom Node will open any file with default programs, File.Size (BattleBIM) - Check file size, File.WriteText+ (BattleBIM) - Write the text content to a specific file path File format “txt, doc, rtf, xls, html, xml” etc, CurveToArc (BattleBIM) - This Custom node will convert curve to arc, Solid.Top&BottomSurface (BattleBIM) - This custom node will extract Top and Bottom Surface from Solid, Star.ByCircle (BattleBIM) - This custom node will create star shape from circle, HTML Table Reader (BattleBIM) - This Custom node will read table from HTML, HTML Tag Extractor (BattleBIM) - This Custom node will extract text from in-between Tag Example:

Paragraph one

Paragraph two

Paragraph threeea

Paragraph three.*

Paragraph three Tag = p, HTML.Clean (BattleBIM) - This custom node will remove all Tags and witll return only Text in-between Tag, Reports HTML to Element ID (BattleBIM) V2 - This Custom node will extract Element ID from HTML file (Navisworks report) , Reports HTML to Element ID - This Custom node will extract Element ID from HTML file (Navisworks report), List.DuplicateItems (BattleBIM) - This Custom node will return list of Duplicate items and their Index number, List.DuplicateItemsWithUniqueName - This Custom node will return list (string) of Duplicate items, their Index number and will assign Unique Name , List.Filter - Filter as you type, List.Filter_ordered (BattleBIM) - Select multiple elements/str from the list/nested list, List.FilterTree(BattleBIM) - Filter multiple items from nested list as you type, List.GetItemAtStringMatch (BattleBIM) - This custom node will extract whole list if the String Match, Integer.Even and Odd (BattleBIM) - This Custom node will distinguish Even and Odd number, List.LastItem (BattleBIM) - Extract last item from each list, List.Reverse (BattleBIM) - Creates a new list containing the items of the given list but in reverse order. Input MUST be List of String ., List.TakeEvenAndOdd (BattleBIM) - This custom node will separate Even and Odd item, OS.ComputerName(Py) (BattleBIM) - This Custom node will retrieves your Computer Name, OS.IPAddress (BattleBIM) - Get your IP Address, OS.TimeConvert (BattleBIM) - Convert yyyymmddHHMMSS.mmmmmmsUUU to YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS, CopyToClipboard (BattleBIM)(Array) - This Custom node will convert list to array then send copy to clipboard , CopyToClipboard (BattleBIM) - This Custom node will copy to clipboard (Single Item), jamShitStr To Normal String (BattleBIM)(List) - This custom node will clean jamShitStr To Normal String (BattleBIM) ** Applicable for list, jamShitStr To Normal String (BattleBIM) - This custom node will clean jamShitStr To Normal String ** Applicable for single line string, MessageBox (BattleBIM) - Type for Button: 0 = OK 1 = Abort, Retry, and Ignore 2 = Cancel, Try Again, Continue 3 = Help 4 = OK and Cancel 5 = Retry and Cancel 6 = Yes and No 7 = Yes, No, and Cancel Type for Icon: 0 = Warning 1 = Information 2 = Question 3 = Stop 4 = No Icon , PDF.FileNameToExcel (BattleBIM) - This Custom node will export all the PDF file names and paths to Excel **For Root & Sub-directory, Delete.DuplicateLine (BattleBIM) - This Custom node will delete all DuplicateLines from the Current Document. It's simillar to Kill command in AutoCAD, Delete.NotPlacedAndNotEnclosedRooms (BattleBIM) - This custom node help you to delete those rooms are Not Placed and Not Enclosed, Delete.UnoccupiedSpace (BattleBIM) - This custom node help you to delete those Unoccupied Space, Document.BuiltInCategories (BattleBIM) - List all the available BuiltInCategories *Base node from [Clockwork.Revit.Document.Query], Element.FilterTree(BattleBIM) - Filter multiple elements from nested list as you type, Elements in Views From Link Doc (BattleBIM) - This custom node will retrive elements from views of link document, Get Active View (BattleBIM) - Get Active View, Get All Views(BattleBIM) - This node will query all views in the model and return them based on category, Revit_Get Family List for this project - **Forks, Revit_Get System Types as List - uses HostObjAttributes parent class to collect **Forks, Grid.Dimension(BattleBIM) - This Custom node will place overall and multi segment dimensions according to grids, Model Categories (BattleBIM) - List of Model Categories According to "Visibility/Graphic Overrides for Floor Plan", Model Categories in Active Document (BattleBIM) - List of Model Categories According to "Visibility/Graphic Overrides for Floor Plan", Print Settings - This custom node will retrieve Print Settings from Document, Revit Backup File Remover (BattleBIM) - This custom node will remove Revit Backup File ** This custom node will removed Revit Backup File (rvt). If the filename ended with “0001 – 0999” after “.” Which means last 4 digits. If the filename doesn’t contain 4 digits at the end, this custom node with NOT remove. i.e. “Lingkon.0001.rvt” between “Lingkon.0999.rvt” , Room.FromExcel (BattleBIM) - This custom node create rooms in bulk from excel (provided template) file, Section.ByCurve (BattleBIM) - This custom node will create section view based on curve, TopographyToPolySurface(BattleBIM) - This custom node will convert Topography to PolySurface, TopographyToSurface(BattleBIM) - This custom node will convert Topography to surface, UnusedSheet.Schedule - This custom node will generate a schedule of unused sheets in the current document, View.FilterTree(BattleBIM) - Filter multiple elements from nested list as you type, ViewSheetSet From Document (BattleBIM) - This custom node retrive View/Sheet Set from Link/Current document, ViewSheetSet To Sheet (BattleBIM) - This custom node retrieve all sheets available in the ViewSheetSet , Wall.Dimension(BattleBIM) - This Custom node will place Dimension of core of walls, String.AllIndicesOfBasedOnPartialMatch (BattleBIM) - Find Indexes in list Based on partial string ** Search For Single Item ** Use List.UniqueItems node if show repeated Indices, String.AllIndicesOfBasedOnPartialMatch(BattleBIM)-Multiple - Find Indexes in list Based on partial string ** Search For Multiple Item ** Use List.UniqueItems node if show repeated Indices, String.Contain.Letters (BattleBIM)? - This Custom node will find if list contains letters. Output will be boolean, String.Extract Integer - This custom node will extract integer from string. Example: This is 100 dollar result will be 100 ** Make sure "This is 100 dollar" NOT "This is100dollar", String.ExtractNumber (BattleBIM) - This custom node will extract number from string *Set Lacing to Longest if list, String.ExtractNumberAndInteger (BattleBIM) - This custom node will extract number and integer from string *Set Lacing to Longest if list, String.FilterTree(BattleBIM) - Filter multiple items from nested list as you type, String.GetItemAtIndex (BattleBIM) - Get String At Index ** If list set Lacing to Longest, String.GetKeys (BattleBIM) - Gets all keys from the specified key-value pair list then covert them to string, String.RemoveFirstAndLast (BattleBIM) - This Custom Node will removed First and Last if match letters, String.Replace (BattleBIM) - Replace all occurrence of text in a string with other text, String.Sort - String (Text) Sort, String.Trim (BattleBIM) - This custom node will remove all characters after a given character, IntToStr.LeadingAnyChars(BattleBIM) - This custom node will convert integer to string with leading zeros on the left. **For list change Lacing to Longest, IntToStr.LeadingZeros(Py)(BattleBIM) - This custom node will convert integer to string with leading zeros on the left. **For list change Lacing to Longest
